title: conferred on it by section 3 (6)(a) of the Wireless Telegraphy Act 1926 (No. 45
heading: 1. This order may be cited as the Wireless Telegraphy Act 1926 (Section 3)
text_raw:
1. This order may be cited as the Wireless Telegraphy Act 1926 (Section 3) 
Satellite Earth Stations for Satellite Personal Communication Services 
(Revocation) Order 2021 

Interpretation
text_norm: 1 order may cited wireless telegraphy act 1926 (section 3) satellite earth station satellite personal communication service (revocation) order 2021 interpretation

title: conferred on it by section 3 (6)(a) of the Wireless Telegraphy Act 1926 (No. 45
heading: 2. The Interpretation Act 2005 (No. 23 of 2005) applies to this Order.
text_raw:
2. The Interpretation Act 2005 (No. 23 of 2005) applies to this Order. 

Revocation

title: conferred on it by section 3 (6)(a) of the Wireless Telegraphy Act 1926 (No. 45
heading: 3. The following statutory instrument is hereby revoked:
text_raw:
3. The following statutory instrument is hereby revoked: 

(1) Statutory Instrument Number 173 of 2000, the Wireless 
Telegraphy Act, 1926 (Section 3) (Exemption of Mobile Satellite Earth 
Stations For Satellite Personal Communication Systems Operating in 
Bands Below 1 GHz (S-Pcs<<1 GHz)) Order, 2000. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Commission for 
Communications Regulation, 

25 November, 2021. 

ROBERT MOURIK, 

Commissioner, For and on Behalf of the Commission for 
Communications Regulation. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 30th November, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [642] 3

title: conferred on it by section 3 (6)(a) of the Wireless Telegraphy Act 1926 (No. 45
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The purpose of this order is to revoke Statutory Instrument Number 173 of 2000, 
the Wireless Telegraphy Act, 1926 (Section 3) (Exemption of Mobile Satellite 
Earth Stations for Satellite Personal Communication Systems Operating in 
Bands Below 1 GHz (S-Pcs<<1 GHz)) Order, 2000
